Projekt SNAKE

System Nagłego Alarmowania o Kradzieży Elektroniki

About the project

The purpose of the project is to serve as an alarm to the headquarters of the scientific club in which I participate. In addition to the functionality of alarm reporting after opening doors or windows, we decided to expand the system to something like a smart home system. The project is still in progress. We used an evaluation board from Toradex with i.MX 7 processor on which we wrote a GUI application in python. As part of further development of the project, we plan to use the cortex m4 core built into the procressor to support low-level peripherals and interruptions.

SnakeUPS

one of the objectives of the project was to be independent of the mains power supply, so we designed a charger and emergency power supply system for the rest of the electronics. we use a large gel battery to power the project.

GUI

The GUI was written in python with the use of the QT library. We also plan to integrate the application with the backend in order to send information about the state of the laboratory to the network.

Toradex i.MX 7 eval board

Architecture composed of two cores (application and microcontroller) is becoming more and more popular, so the possibility of working with such a device gives us great opportunities to gain valuable skills on the job market.

By Mateusz Janus
